title: Adsorption of nucleotides and nucleic acids on goethite nanoparticles: mode, sites and relationship with phosphate and non-phosphate structures
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00891F, Paper
Huajun Feng, Shanshan Ma, Zaiming Chen, Yungui Li, Meizhen Wang, Yangcheng Ding
The impact of iron (hydr)oxide adsorption on nucleotides and nucleic acids (NNAs) in the environment varies.
